charges.charge_disposition: dft is sentenced to Count 1 of the Information on 6/23/98; dft is placed on a term of probation for 3 years; Special Conditions of Probation are: Successfully participate in a program of home detention for 3 months which may included electronic monitoring, with the costs to be paid as directed by the Probation Office; pay any fine balance on a schedule approved by the Court during the first 24 months of supervision; provide the Probation Office with access to any requested financial information; Not incur new credit charges or open additional lines of credit without the approval of the Probation Office; Not be employed in any capacity related to the insurance business; During the period of probation, the dft shall have no contact, either directly or indirectly, with Ferrell Travis Riley or any members of the Riley family, Cheryll S Coon, and Treva M Shay; Special Assessment of $50.00 and $1,000.00 Fine imposed; The costs of supervision are waived; The fine is due immediately and the fine is in installments to commence 30 days after the date of this judgment; The Court adopts the factual findings and guideline application in the presentence report; The fine is below the guideline range because of inability to pay (1)
